comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: She arrived in New York on October 24, 1915 on the liner St. Paul to star in a "high- class comedy", "Mrs. Thompson", by Sydney Grundy, about a woman who owns a store in provincial England. She trusted the American public to appreciate a play about "real, everyday people without having adventuresses and stage villains in the cast." select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0911FA395D1673...
